abstract.p: Correction to June 20 article about David Beckham's arrival in US to play with Los Angeles Galaxy concerns location of game scheduled for Oct 18 between Galaxy and New York Red Bulls

block.p: A report in the Extra Time soccer roundup on Wednesday, about complications surrounding David Beckham's arrival in the United States to play with the Los Angeles Galaxy, misstated the location of a game scheduled for Oct. 18 between the Galaxy and the Red Bulls that Beckham might miss. It will be in Los Angeles, not at Giants Stadium. (The teams will play on Aug. 18 at Giants Stadium.)

It will be in Los Angeles, not at Giants Stadium. (The teams will play on Aug. 18 at Giants Stadium.)
